item.title: Alarm over Australia's counterterrorism plans
item.itunes:author: Al Jazeera English
item.itunes:subtitle: On The Stream: Alarm over Australia’s counterterrorism plans.
item.itunes:summary:
Follow The Stream and join Al Jazeera’s social media community:
This episode’s story: http://stream.aljazeera.com/story/201409042009-0024118
FACEBOOK: http://www.facebook.com/AJStream TWITTER: https://twitter.com/AJStream GOOGLE+: http://google.com/+TheStream
****************************************­************ On The Stream: Alarm over Australia’s counterterrorism plans.
Thumbnail: Since 2008 almost 50,000 asylum-seekers have arrived by boat in Australia and more than 1,000 have drowned when their flimsy craft failed to make the 360-kilometre journey from the coast of Java to Australia's Christmas Island outpost. EPA/HOTLI SIMANJUNT
item.guid: 3767920868001: Alarm over Australia's counterterrorism plans

item.title: No games for women with 'too much' testosterone
item.itunes:author: Al Jazeera English
item.itunes:subtitle: On The Stream: Fairness in women’s athletics and the debate around testosterone testing.

Follow The Stream and join Al Jazeera’s social media community:

FACEBOOK: http://www.facebook.com/AJStream TWITTER: https://twitter.com/AJStream GOOGLE+: http://google.com/+TheStream
****************************************­************ On The Stream: Fairness in women’s athletics and the debate around testosterone testing.
Thumbnail: After claiming the world 800-meter title in a fast time at her first major international meet in 2009, South Africa's Caster Semenya was subjected to invasive gender tests because of her muscular build and rapid improvement in times. (AP/MARTIN MEISSNER)
item.guid: 3766103129001: No games for women with 'too much' testosterone
